item.title: Sovos Brands Inc S-1
item.description: Sovos Brands Inc, which is in the Food & Kindred Products [2000] industry, SEC S-1 filing on August 08, 2022 had 36230 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 428 instances shares - 327 instances adjusted - 307 instances common - 265 instances 1 - 260 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
